body:
So hey, im Ludcha. 13 years old. Im currently living in Sweden. I'm a member of Bad Company. I am a defender. 

so yeah ask me something funny

title: AMA - Ludcha/Ludchi

replies.body:
hm something funny
i heared someone today in my school saying to another dude "do you know the people that keep saying 'do not do the same joke twice'? then why do you have brothers" i laughed LOL

replies.body:
Sir Ludcha, of the Nordic Lands,
I do pose an inquiry of thee. In the circumstances of a choice twix eating a dog, mignon of nature, or a cat, dainty of essence, which would be your conclusion, and reasoning of the prime?
Yours Truly,
- YaKnee <3
